DIA_CrazyWolfSon_AreYouRetarded_15_01: Are you crazy? What are you doing?
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_AreYouRetarded_03_03: I'm the real Wolf Son! Not like the rest of these crooks.
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_AreYouRetarded_03_04: I have the true blood of the wolf in me... I will become a wolf! AWOOO!
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_YesYouAreRetarded_03_02: You're wrong! I'm about to become a real wolf.
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_YesYouAreRetarded_03_03: I need the scroll! I know they exist. Bring it to me and you'll see!
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_BecomeAnimal_03_02: YEAH! AWOOO! I'm finally going to be a wolf!
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_BecomeAnimal_15_03: Ekhem, before you get transformed, why don't you thank me somehow for helping you with this madness?
DIA_CrazyWolfSon_BecomeAnimal_03_04: Oh, yeah! Take this meat! You'll like it!
